# fvoa

The goal of fvoa is to scrape fantasy information from ESPN and Yahoo Fantasy Football and 
    can uses data to compare teams, simulate seasons, and create visuals. Essentially everything 
    you need to build analytics behind your trash-talking.

You can install te development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("scottfrechette/fvoa")
```
